Richmond.Point Pinole Regional Shoreline: The Point Pinole Regional Shoreline is a regional park on the shores of the San Pablo Bay, California (the northern arm of the San Francisco Bay), in the United States. It is approximately 2,315 acres (9.37 km2) in area, and is operated by the East Bay Regional Park District. It is the home of the Point Pinole Lagoon and Whittel Beach and a festival.
